org.apache.http.client.params

接口 AllClientPNames

  • 所有超级接口:
    AuthPNames, ClientPNames, ConnConnectionPNames, ConnManagerPNames, ConnRoutePNames, CookieSpecPNames, CoreConnectionPNames, CoreProtocolPNames
    已过时。 
    (4.3) use RequestConfig, ConnectionConfig, SocketConfig

    @Deprecated
public interface AllClientPNames
extends CoreConnectionPNames, CoreProtocolPNames, ClientPNames, AuthPNames, CookieSpecPNames, ConnConnectionPNames, ConnManagerPNames, ConnRoutePNames
    Collected parameter names for the HttpClient module. This interface combines the parameter definitions of the HttpClient module and all dependency modules or informational units. It does not define additional parameter names, but references other interfaces defining parameter names.

    This interface is meant as a navigation aid for developers. When referring to parameter names, you should use the interfaces in which the respective constants are actually defined.

    从以下版本开始:
    4.0

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.http.params.CoreConnectionPNames

        CONNECTION_TIMEOUT, MAX_HEADER_COUNT, MAX_LINE_LENGTH, MIN_CHUNK_LIMIT, SO_KEEPALIVE, SO_LINGER, SO_REUSEADDR, SO_TIMEOUT, SOCKET_BUFFER_SIZE, STALE_CONNECTION_CHECK, TCP_NODELAY

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.http.params.CoreProtocolPNames

        HTTP_CONTENT_CHARSET, HTTP_ELEMENT_CHARSET, HTTP_MALFORMED_INPUT_ACTION, HTTP_UNMAPPABLE_INPUT_ACTION, ORIGIN_SERVER, PROTOCOL_VERSION, STRICT_TRANSFER_ENCODING, USE_EXPECT_CONTINUE, USER_AGENT, WAIT_FOR_CONTINUE

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.http.client.params.ClientPNames

        ALLOW_CIRCULAR_REDIRECTS, CONN_MANAGER_TIMEOUT, CONNECTION_MANAGER_FACTORY_CLASS_NAME, COOKIE_POLICY, DEFAULT_HEADERS, DEFAULT_HOST, HANDLE_AUTHENTICATION, HANDLE_REDIRECTS, MAX_REDIRECTS, REJECT_RELATIVE_REDIRECT, VIRTUAL_HOST

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.http.auth.params.AuthPNames

        CREDENTIAL_CHARSET, PROXY_AUTH_PREF, TARGET_AUTH_PREF

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.http.cookie.params.CookieSpecPNames

        DATE_PATTERNS, SINGLE_COOKIE_HEADER

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.http.conn.params.ConnConnectionPNames

        MAX_STATUS_LINE_GARBAGE

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.http.conn.params.ConnManagerPNames

        MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_ROUTE, MAX_TOTAL_CONNECTIONS, TIMEOUT

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.http.conn.params.ConnRoutePNames

        DEFAULT_PROXY, FORCED_ROUTE, LOCAL_ADDRESS
